org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline

Class RestfulPipeConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.PipeConfiguration<RestfulPipeConfiguration>
      • org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.RestfulPipeConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.Config<RestfulPipeConfiguration>

    public class RestfulPipeConfiguration
extends PipeConfiguration<RestfulPipeConfiguration>
implements org.jboss.aerogear.android.Config<RestfulPipeConfiguration>
    Configures a Pipe which interacts with RESTful endpoints.
